intro: Hieracium oigocladum, commonly known as the yellow hawkweed, is a flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and ragworts. The plant features bright yellow flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer. Its leaves are typically lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs. Hieracium oigocladum is often found in meadows, grasslands, and disturbed soils.
